newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: RTRS-Canberra says higher GDP growth a major goal.
newsitem.headline: RTRS-Canberra says higher GDP growth a major goal.

text.p: Australian Prime Minister John Howard said on Thursday higher economic growth was a major goal for the coalition government.
"Achieving a higher rate of economic growth is a major goal ... of this government," Howard told parliament
"The only way that you can really have a sustainable reduction in unemployment is to have a much faster rate of economic growth and that we need to take the speed limits off growth," Howard said.
In its budget for the year to June 30, 1997, released on August 20, Howard's conservative Liberal-National government forecast annual GDP growth of 3.75 percent.
